item.description:
Come meet the Wedelns or catch up with us if you're missing our company!  If you are curious in finding out what we do, we are an active, four season club and we'd love to tell you more about us!  There will be several Wedeln members at this event, full of answers to your questions.

If weather cooperates, we will be on the roofdeck for this event. Come as early as 5pm. Complimentary full food buffet starts at 6pm.  Cash bar.  Please note the dress code as they are strict and will refuse entry if you are wearing sneakers, shorts, t-shirts or hats. We don't make their rules but want to see you so please take note! :)

 

Complimentary full food buffet (6-9) and free admission.
********************************************************
Sample menu (menu subject to change)
o Crab cakes, Buffalo wings
o Marinated steak tips
o Assorted Sliders
o King Crab Lillipops
o Delicious pastas

Dress code:
Dress to impress, NO Sneakers, shorts, t-shirts or hats

Guest details:
All guests must be 21+ with proper ID. These events are geared toward young professionals in their 20s, 30s, 40s.

MBTA stop is South Station or China Town
Metered street is present and Valet parking is $20

Splash Lounge, 150 Kneeland Street, Boston
http://www.splash-boston.com/
item.how_to_find_us: f weather cooperates, we will be on the roofdeck. Otherwise, we will be downstairs. Look for a group of smiling, friendly faces!
item.name: Wedeln Happy Hour at Splash in Boston!!
